Agile Webinar Series: Testing at the Speed of Agile
Featuring Diego Lo Giudice from Forrester Research
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Customers have always expected great software, fast. But things are different now – we’ve entered the Age of the Customer. Customers, empowered through social media and mobile devices, are driving expectations for speed and quality even higher than before.
Join our webinar and hear Diego Lo Giudice, Vice President and Principal Analyst at Forrester Research, discuss how Agile testing practices are key to delivering high-quality applications quickly.
Other things you’ll learn about Agile testing:
- Integrate your testing into your development processes - Make sure your Agile testing, like your Agile development, is incremental, iterative, and continuous - Keep Agile testing efficient with test automation and service virtualization
Wolfgang Platz, Founder and CPO of Tricentis, will host the webinar.
Please contact us <mailto:webinar@tricentis.com> with any questions or concerns. Best regards,
